message.body: 24th anytime, 27 before 1:30
Thanks lady!
Studio times! Tomorrow, 4-6, thurs, 5-6, fri and sat tba!
Hey lady! Any chance you could make 2/3 hours available on either aug 20, 21, 27 or 28? We can start late (9ish) or early if that helps! Thanks!
What time is rehearsal on sat again?
Rad.
At 7th n market in my car. There soon sorry!
Ok!
Im here xo
Ok, prolly 10-15 late again bc i forgot to print my script. But i finally did
Huzzah, no worries
Dont forget to kill that cake in the fridge you taste testers
Mmmmmm thanks momma!
Gonna be 10-15 late. Meh. Xo
K
If you wanna come tomorrow, we're here 4-9, you can come sistah!
Ive now got a production mtg for fest bar scheduled at 7:30. And i work til 5. meh. Sorry to be a rehearsal tease.
No prob busy lady! Ps, I talk like you all the time now :-)
Rehearsal at 5:30
How you feel about rehearsing noon to 4? Think you'll be ok to drive down?
Ok, seems fine. Leaving now
Yay!
Tell her hi but im hosting the late nite cabaret tonite. See ya tomorrow! Xo
Cool, i think there are some good bands playing
Yeayea, gonna try to stop by!
Wanna get a drink before (during, after) lady m tonight?
Come to franks for pre show shot when ya ready!
Word, we are paying now. Do sit w me and my cos xoxo
Headed to show
We's upstairs!
There in 15 xo
K
I have 3 couch cushions in my car xo
Yay
Fyi i am still at late nite cabaret and wont be back to ruba. If team water bears is still feelin fiesty, bring em over xo
Awesome. We went to chris', if you wanna join
We havent even gone on yet, im gonna die in here : ) i love you
All my love is yours
Mindy loves you too

Brett and i decided to go to the poconos w the fam this wknd, so im out. But don’t let that stop ya! Though, if you have to reschedule, sundays are good days for me. I love you people! Congrats again, mama, yer hard work really paid off and was enjoyed by
Feel free to stop by after the show! I could meetcha tomorrow txixt 3:30-4:30 or after 9:30pm
Yo i can swing by at 9:30 if thats cool
Yes!
Cool, ill be there in 20
K
I can come from 4-5:45 today!
Poyfect!
2nd n master
Can you look into borrowing that wireless mic? If not for tonite thats fine, but for thurs/fri? That would be truly amaaaazing. Xo
Doubt he could bring it to you tonight, but will shoot for thurs at least!
I love you. Thanks!
John says you can have it,
Wait, nm, it's at tranny
So, see if Jeremy is going over today, if not, he'll def be there tomorrow eve
Hey lady, what time is the cookie fest today?
5pm on. Whos this i lost my phone
Kennedy :-) cool, I may try to stop by if I have time!
Im gonna get there round 6 and leave round 10. Def come if you can, its always a great mix of folks and a lotta fun
Cool, might swing by round 8:30!
Are you going to the pig benefit tonight?
Hell to the yeah
Sweet! May see you there!
Totes. Lets make a point to find each other
Hey are you around? Im looking for a buddy to kill time with til 7
Only till 4:30, then I gotta head to circus school. But if you wanna pop over until then yr welcome (and welcome to stay and chillax after I go too)!
Sorry i missed ya, i ended up taking a yoga class down the road from school. But thanks! Lets try to hang soon, id love that xoxo
Remind me, are you coming tonite?
Oh hell yeah. Gimme his number too, im away from the computer til tmrw afternoon
7:30 call time tonite. Thanx!
Did you talk to jeremy about playing saturday/is that a possability/did he look at the tune xo
He's got the tune, thinks he can do sat but not 100%, depends on how well school goes this week I think
Do you need me tonight?
Actually, no. Take the night off xo
Thx darlin. I can 100% com early tomorrow if you need me?
Under my thumb just came on at Fergies and it makes me think of you a lot. With a big smile. That's all : )
Bwa. Xoxo to you m'dear!

Yo, I just left you a message but I think I hung up. Can you and Jeremy see our show tomorrow opening night if I comp you? I also want to talk to you about puppetyranny helping promote my shows--your fan base would LOVE them and frankly our ticket sales s

Jeremy has work and tomorrow is the only day I can see robs show :-( I am coming on Friday tho! Thx for the offer, wish I could make it for opening. But I'm definitely down to talk on Friday after if you like!

Let's chat. What would be amazing is if you could reach out to your fan base in whatever way you think is best--an eblast, putting out cards in your programs, giving us a shout out in your curtain speech, whatever. We'd do the same Think on it--I really b
Sure! We can talk it over tomorrow (or tonight, I'll be at fringe bar around midnight) and work something out!
Great! I'll be there too. Have a good show!! Xo
Have a fabulous opening! Sorry I can't make it!

See it some other time! I posted info on discounts on my fb page. And make a point to see madis show especially--as a writer I think you will really love and appreciate more than most. It is extraordinary writing. Love! You!

Yea, I'm really essited about Popsicle. J has work every night but he's hoping he gets out in time for yours tomorrow at least! And I will def be there tomorrow night! Will check out yr page fr sure, thankee!
So I'm going to that extra show of bang tonight...wanna meet before Popsicle and chat? Round 7:15 at underground?
You around for a beer tonite? I wanted to chat w you without creepy Sam Hopkins ramping up the awkward... :)
Eek, actually, can you spread the word if it comes up that I had a family car drama and can't be there tonight? And maybe we can make a beer date and you can share your notes w me?? Xoxo
Lame!!! I really wanted to talk to you too. I am free tomorrow if you wanna hang then
Bah! I am booked tomorrow. Unless you come see the brat scratch night at trestle tomorrow and we have a beer afters.
Or Thursday I'm free happy hour and then there's another brat scratch night at 7:00.
I can do Thursday after 3! Where ya wanna meet?
I have to be at the trestle inn at 6 and I'm thinking about dropping off a resume at silk city at 4....wanna do trestle at 4:30? Or somewhere in between those places?
HAWT.
Sounds good! Trestle at 4:30. See ya tomorrow!
Let's say 5, can you dig it
Yes, thank you! I was gonna say the same
